15 class SettlePlanner : public PlannerForCommandType<SettleCommand> {
16 public:
17  enum class SettlePlannerStates {
18  // Moves to the ball path in front of it
19  Intercept,
20  // Starts to dampen the ball with backward motion
21  Dampen
22  };
23 
24  SettlePlanner()
25  : PlannerForCommandType("settle"),
26  avg_instantaneous_intercept_target_(0, 0),
27  average_ball_vel_(0, 0) {}
28 
29  Trajectory plan(const PlanRequest& plan_request) override;
30 
31  void reset() override;
32 
33  static void create_configuration(Configuration* cfg);
34 
35 private:
36  // Given the global target in `target_bounce_direction`
37  // Calculate the delta position to get the robot in the correct location
38  // And the face point to get the bounce right
39  // If no target_bounce_direction is given, just get in front and face the ball
40  void calc_delta_pos_for_dir(BallState ball, RobotInstant start_instant,
41  double* angle_out, rj_geometry::Point* delta_robot_pos,
42  rj_geometry::Point* face_pos);
43 
44  // Restarts the state machine if our calculations are whack
45  // and won't intercept ball correctly anymore
46  void check_solution_validity(BallState ball, RobotInstant start_instant,
47  rj_geometry::Point delta_pos);
48 
49  // Figures out when to move to each state
50  // (only in the standard transition)
51  //
52  // Note: start_instant may be changed inside this function
53  // when we are basically at the correct location and
54  // need to start the dampen
55  void process_state_transition(BallState ball, RobotInstant* start_instant,
56  double angle, rj_geometry::Point delta_pos);
57 
58  // State functions
59  Trajectory intercept(const PlanRequest& plan_request,
60  RobotInstant start_instant,
61  const rj_geometry::ShapeSet& static_obstacles,
62  const std::vector<DynamicObstacle>& dynamic_obstacles,
63  rj_geometry::Point delta_pos, rj_geometry::Point face_pos);
64 
65  // Dampen doesn't need to take obstacles into account.
66  Trajectory dampen(const PlanRequest& plan_request, RobotInstant start_instant,
67  rj_geometry::Point delta_pos, rj_geometry::Point face_pos);
68 
69  Trajectory invalid(const PlanRequest& plan_request,
70  const rj_geometry::ShapeSet& static_obstacles,
71  const std::vector<DynamicObstacle>& dynamic_obstacles);
72 
73  std::optional<rj_geometry::Point> target_bounce_direction_;
74 
75  SettlePlannerStates current_state_ = SettlePlannerStates::Intercept;
76 
77  // Intercept Target Filtering Variables
78  rj_geometry::Point avg_instantaneous_intercept_target_;
79  rj_geometry::Point average_ball_vel_;
80  bool first_intercept_target_found_ = false;
81  bool first_ball_vel_found_ = false;
82 
83  // Only change the target of the path if it changes significantly
84  rj_geometry::Point path_intercept_target_;
85 
86  bool path_created_for_dampen_ = false;
87 
88  Trajectory previous_;
89 };
